trans-unit.source: For each tapped nonland permanent target opponent controls, search that player's library for a card with the same name as that permanent and put it into play under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library.\nSuspend 3—{1}{U}{U}

trans-unit.source: "Two magi could trade spells all day and never crown a victor. The real battle is not one of power but of will. If your confidence breaks, so too shall you."\n—Venser
trans-unit.target: 「两位法师可以终日斗咒而仍不分胜负。 真正的战斗不在于力量，而是意志。 一旦自信崩溃，你必将落败。」 ～凡瑟

trans-unit.source: Dreamscape Artist
trans-unit.target: 梦景技艺家

trans-unit.target: {2}{U}，{T}，弃一张牌，牺牲一个地：从你的牌库中搜寻至多两张基本地牌，并将它们放置进场。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: He's mastered the art of sleight of land.
trans-unit.target: 它精通操弄大地之术。

trans-unit.source: Erratic Mutation
trans-unit.target: 飘摇异变

trans-unit.source: Choose target creature. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. That creature gets +X/-X until end of turn, where X is that card's converted mana cost. Put all cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 选择目标生物。 从你牌库顶开始展示牌，直到你展示出一张非地牌为止。 该生物得+X/-X直到回合结束，X为该牌的总法术力费用。 将所有以此法展示的牌依任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.target: {0}：选择连击，反红保护，警戒，或次元幽影。直到回合结束，CARDNAME得-1/-1且获得该异能。 （具次元幽影异能的生物只能阻挡具次元幽影异能的生物，亦只能被具此异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: "With a twitch of its muscles, its timeline forks. Then, just as quickly, its two selves reintegrate. Causality, strangely, seems not to mind."\n—Rukarumel, field journal
trans-unit.target: 「他肌肉抽动一下，便叉开自己的时间流。 然后，就在一瞬间，这两个身体又合而为一。 奇怪地，因果律似乎对它们不起作用。」 ～陆卡陆梅的现场日志

trans-unit.source: Dream of nothing, and wake to a dream come true.
trans-unit.target: 睡眠中梦境空无，醒转时梦境成真。

trans-unit.target: 「为了探索多重宇宙的奇观，寻觅未遭干戈或奇术沾惹的世界. . . 被拒斥的各种可能性多得教人落泪。」

trans-unit.target: 琼纳生与手下打赌取乐，看看打瞌睡的地亚龙与结冻的精灵会是哪个先动。

trans-unit.source: "Belief matters more than truth. Every moment, belief in imaginary things alters lives while truth sits unnoticed and waits."\n—Hakim, Loreweaver
trans-unit.target: 「信念比真实更重要。 不论何时，对幻想事物的信念都能使生命升华，而真实只能坐一旁枯等。」 ～说书人哈金

trans-unit.target: 「这些鱼尾混蛋！ 在我头上搞花样还不够，竟连我身体都要作怪。」 ～晴空号的坦格尔斯

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature can't attack or block.\nEnchanted creature has "{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool."
trans-unit.target: 生物结界 受此结界的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡。 受此结界的生物具有「{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。」

trans-unit.source: "I'll guard this fruit and its seedling until the land is healed. My life now belongs to Dominaria."
trans-unit.target: 「我将守护其果实与苗木，直到大地重现生机。 从今尔后，我的生命属于多明纳里亚。」

trans-unit.source: Vitaspore Thallid
trans-unit.target: 活孢散绿菌

trans-unit.resname: PLC·143 | Vitaspore Thallid | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on CARDNAME.\nRemove three spore counters from CARDNAME: Put a 1/1 green Saproling creature token into play.\nSacrifice a Saproling: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，在CARDNAME上放置一个芽孢指示物。 从CARDNAME上移去三个芽孢指示物：将一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生物放置进场。 牺牲一个腐生物：目标生物获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Wild Pair
trans-unit.target: 野性搭档

trans-unit.resname: PLC·144 | Wild Pair | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature comes into play, if you played it from your hand, you may search your library for a creature card with the same total power and toughness and put it into play. If you do, shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当任一生物进场时，若你从手上使用之，则你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张生物牌，且此牌之力量与防御力的加总需与前者相同，并将它放置进场。 若你如此作，则将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Essence Warden
trans-unit.target: 护华师

trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature comes into play, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物进场时，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "The more our numbers grow, the more I gain hope that Volrath and his cursed stronghold will one day fall."\n—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves
trans-unit.target: 「随着我方势力增强，我更确信瓦拉司与那受诅的城塞必有败亡之日。」 ～叶海大帝艾拉达力

trans-unit.source: Fa'adiyah Seer

trans-unit.target: {T}：抓一张牌并展示之。 如果它不是地牌，将它弃掉。

trans-unit.source: "My visions don't show me home. They show me where home is yet to be found."
trans-unit.target: 「幻象向我展示的并非故里， 而是尚待探访的家园。」

trans-unit.source: Gaea's Anthem
trans-unit.target: 盖亚赞美诗

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: "To those who can hear it, Gaea's battle song brings power as swift as sunlight and as enduring as the deep roots of the forest."\n—Gamelen, Citanul elder
trans-unit.target: 「只要能够听闻盖亚战歌，便能获致快捷如日光、强韧似盘根的力量。」 ～西坦努长者盖美伦

trans-unit.source: Groundbreaker

trans-unit.source: The earth's memory is long, its retribution brief.
trans-unit.target: 大地的记性很久，复仇很短。

trans-unit.source: Harmonize
trans-unit.target: 和谐

trans-unit.source: Draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Life's greatest lessons don't come from focus or concentration. They come from breathing and simply noticing."\n—Seton, centaur druid
trans-unit.target: 「生命最珍贵的教诲并非来自集中或专注， 而是从呼吸与提高点注意力得来的。」 ～半人马德鲁伊熙藤

trans-unit.source: Healing Leaves

trans-unit.source: Choose one Target player gains 3 life; or prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～目标牌手获得3点生命；或者于本回合中防止接下来将对目标生物或牌手造成的3点伤害。

trans-unit.source: The elves of Llanowar don't trust in alchemy. They rely instead on pure herbs harvested from the forest's sacred heart.
trans-unit.target: 罗堰的地精不相信炼金术。 他们只信任从树林神圣中心采集的纯净药草。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains.\n{W}: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控平原，CARDNAME便得+1/+1。 {W}：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: His abode was clean and bare, not a morsel in sight. I asked him what he ate, fearing the answer. He smiled and said his faith alone sustained him.
trans-unit.target: 他的住所干净空旷，一片食物残渣都没有。 我问他都吃些什么，暗自担心着答案。 他微笑道：靠着信念便能饱足。

trans-unit.target: 寇维克斯感觉到米丽没能抵受向她袭来的诅咒。 他心中淌着血，就此逃离。

trans-unit.target: 梦兆龙王殷帖

trans-unit.resname: PLC·158 | Intet, the Dreamer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {2}{U}. If you do, remove the top card of your library from the game face down. You may look at that card as long as it remains removed from the game. You may play that card without paying its mana cost as long as Intet remains in play.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME对牌手造成战斗伤害时，你可以支付{2}{U}。 若你如此作，则将你的牌库顶牌以牌面朝下的方式移出对战。 只要该牌持续被移出对战，你便可以检视之。 只要殷帖持续在场，你便可以使用该牌且不需支付其法术力费用。
